message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right person. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a great deal for you, and still a fair price for me.  Let's get this done!
